attributes.action: tell the Bank of England that it can alter base rate by decimal points not vulgar fractions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in a decimal age.  Vulgar fraction are, well, vulgar, as well as being incrementally rather coarse.  Why increase by a quarter of one percent with speculation about another one being needed next month?  Increase by .35 percent instead.  Why not?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
